Pros- Fun game to play with friends. Unique type of game, PVP co-op survivor/killer horror. They added Bill from L4D. Their licenses for horror movies (and TV shows) are pretty dang good. Cosmetics are great. The jump scares, and the thrills of being chased by a murderer.

Cons- Matchmaking and the multiplayer experience is terrible. After every game, Error Code 111 occurs for me and my teammate. You can't view the scoreboard, the after game chat, see what other perks people are using, no. You get bumped to the title screen and kicked out of your party. Every single game since the last patch (correction, patch 4.0.0). Not only that, you have to load up the actual game menu waiting for everything to initialize and load to select which play mode, re-party up, and queue for another 10 minutes looking for a game. DbD constantly has 40-50k players playing on Steam at any given time, why does the matchmaking take so long for a 5 player game? It's not like the player skill level is even balanced after waiting.

Beyond multiplayer server woes, it's just not a varied game. There are a ton of perks, and different builds to the characters, but the game is exactly the same objective. You fix 5 generators, open the door (or hatch), hooks for the killers, pallets for the survivors, it's all the same every game. The different locales are cool but can be separated into 2 main categories: outside or claustrophobic-ly inside. Beyond that the maps play pretty much the same; and the generators and exits are always in the same spots. The games 'fun' is widely dependent on who you queue with. For example, "tunneling" or specifically going after one person isn't fun but it's part of the game so you can't really fault someone for playing that way. Killer can just camp the survivors on the hooks till they eventually die with no real incentive to go after other players except, "the game isn't supposed to be played that way!" Other times, the killer is widely incompetent and just leads to a quick pushover game that isn't fun.. or you have players trying to do the daily challenges and you just wasted 15 minutes of your time so people can farm 'bloodpoints.' And I'd love to fill out the survey, give a thumbs-up or a thumbs-down to other players, but y'know I just keep getting kicked out of the menu to be able to do that after every post-game.

The in-game models for the most part don't look great. Seems like a lot more effort went into the Killers, and those do look cool. Some survivors at best look okay, whereas other survivors look like nondescript RPG NPCs. The aforementioned Bill looks worse in DbD than L4D, which is a 13 year old game. The in-game voice lines (for what little there is), and the screams on the hooks are all pretty rough to downright terrible. One of the female hook screams sounds like a airhorn put through a trombone mute, it's laughably bad. In the lobby, you'll get a line-read every once in awhile from some the DLC survivors, but after 2-3 lobbies you've heard all that there is to hear. There's also not enough Bruce Campbell lines but that's a valid criticism I have against most games.

There is also no character to character dialogue in game which is weird to me? Everyone's composure must be ridiculously high since there's no "omg omg omg" or "ruuuun!" or scared whispering between the survivors. Everybody is relatively chill considering the dire circumstances, fixing generators and running away from murderers. And that may be a weird critique to make, but it just makes the survivors pretty lifeless to me. They have no character traits as in a personality, just playable perks. And then, there's not even real voice chat among the survivor players, which is an interesting choice. I guess I understand why they did that, but every 4 stack group in the game is gonna be on discord anyways, so it seems like you're just putting those who single queue in a disadvantage to not be able to talk to their teammates or are also not grouped up? I'm no game developer but this game is tremendously better with Teamspeak or discord and friend(s). You can point at things, do a "come over here" motion, and unofficially rapidly crouch to say "please heal me," in game, but there's no real way of saying "we should run, the killer is coming" besides just.. running away. There's consumable items that make fixing or healing slightly faster. Flashlights that some stun the killer and others that are just plain useless. The Bloodweb leveling stuff isn't fun or fulfilling, its just overly cumbersome with the illusion of real depth. Oh, and error code 111 will sometimes just not give you anything for the 10 minute match you were in, so that's cool too.

There is fun to be had with this game. Just don't expect a varied, polished experience that always values your time.

Dead by Daylight est censé "être un jeu horreur" qui oppose 4 survivants à 1 tueur sur différentes cartes.
le but principal pour les survivants est de réparer les 5 générateurs, alors que le tueur doit tuer les 4 survivants.
Le jeu est assez bien équilibré avec un systeme de rank qui n'est pas optimal sur pas mal de points.
Ceci dis, DBD est vraiment appréciable et on peut y passer de bons moments dessus malgré les campeurs et "tunnelers" toxiques qui peuvent ruiner le gameplay des survivants.
Le point que j'aimerais voir évoluer c'est la diversité des modes de jeu... il n'en y a qu'un seul et c'est bien dommage...
En bref, je conseille vraiment Dead by Daylight !

Das Spiel kann man sich kaufen, wenn man es für 2 Euro bekommt, sonst Finger weg.
Diese gottverdammten Bugs die zum großteil spielentscheidend sind bekommen diese Entwickler nicht in den Griff.

1. Du haust dem Killer die Platte in die Fresse, der schwankt, du bekommst den Killerstun Bonus und ne halbe Sekunde später liegste am Boden und weißt nicht warum.
2. Huntress und ihre magischen Äxte die alles und jeden treffen, auch wenn man hinter einem fetten Felsen hockt.
3. Manchmal kommts vor, man schleicht in der Hocke, der Killer trifft einen und schon steckt man in der Hocke fest und kann nicht mehr rennen.
4. Leatherface kann nun dank eines Bugs bis zu 200 kmh durch die Kante rennen.
5. Spiel kackt einfach mal so ab
6. Einige Perks funktionieren nur auf gut Glück, siehe "Hart im nehmen" ... am besten drückt man die Aktive Taste schon 2 Minuten vorher.
7. Beide Ausgänge spawnen direkt nebeneinander .... den Killer freut, der Survivor, chancenlos, hat 100% verloren
8. Cheater. Tja, 2 Cheater vor Wochen reportet und die treiben noch immer ihr Spielchen online und streamen dies sogar auf Twitch (selbst das interessierte BHVG nicht). Dort sieht man sogar wie sie Hackingtools verwenden.

Naja, von Camping und Tunneling will ich hier gar nicht erst anfangen, da beides von BHVG gewollt ist.

Mir als Entwickler eines Spieles wäre es peinlich, wenn mein Spiel nicht für gute Spielmechanik und Inhalte bekannt wäre, sondern für massenhafte Bugs.
Und wenn es dann von den Bugs auch noch tausende Stunden Videomaterial gibt, dann ist es einfach nur traurig.

Neuste Geniestreich dieser "Entwickler": Synch Error .... fürs Spielen gibts keine Punkte, der Rang wird nicht aktualisiert .... na Hauptsache Klamotten für teilweise bis zu 15!! Euro das Stück kann man reibungslos kaufen.

Das Spiel ist nun 4 Jahre alt, so langsam sollte BHVG ihr eigenes Spiel mal in den Griff bekommen haben.
Zum Glück entwickeln diese Devs keine Software für Krankenhäuser oder Notfallzentren.

Fazit: Dieses Spiel ist eine unfertige Software mit inkonsequenter Spielmechanik und mit jedem Update kommen neue Bugs dazu, alte Bugs werden gekonnt ignoriert.
Nur wer mit einer toxischen Community und inkompetenten Entwicklern (die auch gerne Bugs Reports löschen) klar kommt, kann sich das Spiel zulegen, alle anderen machen einen großen Bogen.

Убийца это вообще имба, в большинстве случаев сбежать от них просто невозможно. Играть за выжевшего то еще удовольствие...

Играю в это уже 2000 часов, это примерно год и два месяца.
Честно, я играю в эту игру только из-за надежды что в неё добавят разнообразие и новую механику, изменение баланса игры не с помощью перков, а коренно изменять код. Оптимизация игры вообще топ! Не, серьезно, моя пекарня поддерживает данную игру, но в игре было 30 ФПС, а решил эту проблему через конфиг. Рекомендую эту игру только тем, кто готов отдать свои 700 рублей или сколько она там стоит, на то что покупатель ожидал недо-хоррора и недо-соревновательной игры.

Update 2022 -> Ven la reseña de abajo? ahora mismo con los updates de dbd es todo lo contrario a lo que comento en mi vieja reseña


Old reseña --> Un muy juego pero en el que se nota que los desarrolladores solo les importa la plata en vez del propio game.

Tiene una comunidad demasiado toxica (peor que la del lol).

los desarrolladores viven rompiendo el juego para agregar cosas estéticas pero nunca arreglan los hitbox.

Le dan mas importancia a un solo lado del juego (survivors) si jugas como killer y ganas al final del game te tenes que comer todos los insultos posibles solo porque ganaste.

Si jugas como survivor sin amigos es algo difícil ya que te pueden tocar jugadores de consola (son la peste en este juego) o un grupo de amiguitos de 3 que te dejan morir.

Como comente los jugadores de consola son la peste, por mas que sean rangos altos siguen sin saber jugar y se distinguen 2 clases de jugadores de consola: 1- los que toxiquean en todo el game 2- los que no ayudan en nada.

Si tratas de sacar los logros del juego prepárate a gastar plata y tiempo al pedo (ya que para obtener el logro de killer tenes que tener una partida perfecta cosa que es imposible debido a los continuos dc, en cambio de survivor es mas fácil)
Luego de tantas horas jugadas, solo recomiendo algo, cuidado en gastar tanto dinero por las skins que estan muy bonitas!!!!

dead by buglight

Used to play this back in mid 2017ish when there were not so many DLCs around, but even then it was already noticeable that the devs don't really give a shit about proper balanced gameplay for the average people, and afterwards just continued spamming new DLCs at every available opportunity, introducing more and more overpowered killers, all the while not fixing basic things like connection issues. 
In order to enjoy this game nowadays imo you just have to continue taking the DLC bait and buying all the new stuff to keep up, or get really really good at it, which most people who play purely for fun do not have time for.

I'm not very good though, it does have a bit of a learning curve.
